(Very Clever)

::CyberShark::

    His body was wracked with pain as the el=
ectricty went through him. He dove deeper. The voltage stopped. (No chance =
in Hades that it could do that, it would kill everything in the ocean, or n=
ear it)
    He found a small underground tunnel and went through it. He tra=
nsformed to Robot mode so he could sit and wait for a while.
    All that t=
rouble for one transformer? He thought to himself. I must be really importa=
nt.
    He decided to look around. He came out on the other side of the tun=
nel in the Caspian Sea, or what would be. (He jumped into the Red Sea and s=
wam through the Med Sea. 
    He got out of the water, turning the cloaking=
 feild back on. He knew his Spark was gaining evil, he quieted it. He walke=
d in as much shadow as he could. He returned to the cave where Battera was.=
 He walked up to her, decloaking.
    "Hey," He said. "I hate to do this to=
 you, but I gotta run for the time being, when you next see me, I might not=
 look like me."
    He picked up his gun without saying another word and le=
ft. As he walked out he cloaked.
    He started to walk to the Destron base=
.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, November 12, 2000 4:50 PM
  Subject: Re: All my =
Characters


  ::Zardus/Havoc/Demolition::

  Zardus growls, looking at the=
 splash as CyberShark runs off. His 
  wrist comp beeps, the Iron Fist easi=
ly locating his cloaced 
  signature. The electricity dispensers powering u=
p, the water around 
  Cybershark is filled with heavy shocks, energon nets=
 moving around 
  him as well.

  Zardus turns to Zergling as Demolition wa=
lks over to pick him up, 
  Havoc launching off to follow Cybershark, locke=
d on to his signature. 
  As soon as the bot left the sea, if the elecrtici=
ty and energon 
  didn't kill him....
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Zardu=
s frowns, walking up to Zergling. Cybershark had reprogrammed 
  the bot, t=
hat was obvious. He hears the bot's words before Zergling 
  went into stas=
is.

  "No, not betray. Just fix," Zardus says to him, then looking at 
  D=
emolition.

  "Take him to the lab, my other self will know what to do."

 =
 Demolition nods, walking off toward the Iron Fist.





  --- In nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
  > ::CyberShark/Zergling::
=
  > 
  >     CyberShark was hit by some blasts and turned to look at who wa=
s 
  shooting.
  >     "Great," CyberShark said as he lifted Zergling in fr=
ont of 
  him. "Just great."
  >     He threw Zergling who was still a litt=
le groggy. CyberShark 
  then turned toward the sea, running at full steam.=
 He cloaked, he 
  didn't care anymore, guns were shooting at him, but afte=
r he cloaked 
  the guns couldn't find him. He jumped into the sea and star=
ted to 
  swim deeped, transforming to Beast Mode as he did.
  >     He tur=
ned on his propellor (A tail that splits into four 
  blades) and took off =
under the water, toward somewhere that he might 
  be safe.


        eGrou=
ps Sponsor
